sentences.sentence: Works centered or decentered in the well – for extra operational flexibility;
sentences.translation: 可以用居中或者偏心的方式下入井内——操作弹性更强；

sentences.sentence: This conflict makes the literary text a decentered structure full of contradictions.
sentences.translation: 正因为这种冲突，使文本成为一个充满矛盾的离心结构。

sentences.sentence: We investigate the aberration properties of the conformal optical system with decentered and tilted elements by vector aberration theory.
sentences.translation: 运用矢量像差理论分析了包含有较大偏心量和有较大倾斜角元件的共形光学系统的像差特性。
